before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"aq9eb","text":"Before beginning this protocol, ensure that wash buffers have been properly diluted with ethanol and that the centrifuge is available and not chilled at low temperatures may impede ethanol evaporation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"3d4nn","text":"Extraction of viral DNA/RNA from culture lysate or filtered samples free from bacteria. The protocol is based on the Qiagen kit QIAamp Viral RNA Mini kit for 96 well plates and uses consumables from this kit as well as the Pierce Universal Nuclease. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"31s7n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
